author: Kris Maher
title: Prosecutor Cites Cosby’s Own Words on Sedatives and Women
text:
NORRISTOWN, Pa.—Bill Cosby’s lawyers opened their defense at his sexual-assault retrial Wednesday by calling a key witness to bolster their contention that his main accuser made up her story about being abused by him for a big payday.
Marguerite Jackson, an academic adviser at Temple University, described watching a news account about a high-profile sexual-assault case in 2004 with her former colleague Andrea Constand. Ms. Constand at first said she too had been assaulted but then quickly reversed herself and said it hadn’t...
